title: GM 's research and development expenditures 2015 to 2019
summary: This statistic displays a forecast of the petroleum and refinery end-use market output in the united from 2019 to 2022 . Through 2020 , the petroleum and refinery end-use market output is expected to increase by 2.2 percent . u.s. petroleum refinery market It is projected that the growth of output from the u.s. petroleum refinery end-use market will slow , from a rate of 2.2 percent in 2020 to 0.5 percent in 2023 , and grow again to 2.2 percent in 2024 .
gold: General Motors incurred around 6.8 billion U.S. dollars in R & D costs in 2019 . This figure puts the car manufacturer 's R & D intensity at five percent . That said , the company declared interest to enter into cost sharing arrangements with third parties .
